question: 飲み会
sourceMnemonic: You know that <ja>飲む</ja> is drink, so this has to do with <kanji>drink</kanji>ing. Also, <ja>会</ja> means <kanji>meet</kanji>, so when you meet to drink you're getting together with others to drink. It's a <vocabulary>drinking party</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings come from the <ja>飲む</ja> vocabulary word and the regular kanji reading for <ja>会</ja>. Hopefully you know both of those by now so you can apply them to the reading of this word, too!
